Intervention: Intervention by the Democratic People's Republic of Korea

Young breast cancer participants will receive their CSPRs and will have access to additional information on reproductive health education on the web, including resource lists on relevant websites, followed by regular reproductive health invitations and 24-week follow-up reminders.

:: Reproductive Health Survival Care Plan (PRSP): The Reproductive Health Survival Care Plan (PRSP) is an online educational tool that will include information on how to manage various reproductive health issues such as hot flashes, fertility problems, contraceptive practices and sexual function.
At the end of the 24 weeks of follow-up, they will have access to their CSP.
Control: Web-based resource lists and text-based adherence reminders
Eligibility: Complete treatment with surgery, radiotherapy and chemotherapy (if applicable)
Able to consent to the study
• Pregnant women at the time of recruitment
Results: Number of participants with a 50% decrease in hot flash rating

The hot flash score is calculated as the weighted sum of the number of hot flashes in each gravity category multiplied by an exclusive weight of gravity (1-light, 2-moderate, 3-severity, 4-very severe). The minimum is 0 and there is no maximum. For example, a woman may experience an unlimited number of hot flashes per day.
Title of the arm/group: RCS intervention

- Arm/Group Description: Young participants in breast cancer will receive their CSPRs and will have access to additional information on reproductive health education on the Web, including resource lists on useful websites, followed by regular reproductive health invitations and follow-up reminders for 24 weeks.

:: Reproductive Health Survival Care Plan (PRSP): The Reproductive Health Survival Care Plan (PRSP) is an online educational tool that will include information on how to manage various reproductive health issues such as hot flashes, fertility problems, contraceptive practices and sexual function.
Type of measure: Number of participants
At the end of the 24 weeks of follow-up, they will have access to their HSP.
Control: Web-based resource lists and text-based adherence reminders
Type of measure: Number of participants
